mapper.select: SELECT date AS redate, begin_time AS retime FROM sys_register_service WHERE id = #{reid}
SELECT id AS register_service_id,status, begin_time, sys_doctor_id FROM sys_register_service WHERE id=#{sys_register_service_id}

select DISTINCT sd.name doctorName,sd.hospitalName,srs.sys_doctor_id,srs.date,dhr.department_level1 department from sys_doctor sd RIGHT JOIN (select MAX(date) date,sys_doctor_id from sys_register_service GROUP BY sys_doctor_id )srs ON sd.id=srs.sys_doctor_id LEFT join doctor_hospital_relation dhr ON sd.id=dhr.sys_doctor_id where DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y:%c:%d'), INTERVAL 2 DAY) > srs.date ;
select * from sys_register_service srs where srs.id=#{id}

select srs.id,su.name,su.phone,srs.date, srs.begin_time,srs.price, sdl.route root,sdl.hospitalName,sdl.location,sh.position,sh.medical_process,sa.nickname from sys_register_service srs left join sys_doctor sd on srs.sys_doctor_id=sd.id left join sys_user su on su.id=sd.sys_user_id left join sys_doctor_location sdl on sdl.id=srs.location_id left join sys_hospital sh on sh.id = sdl.sys_hospital_id left join sys_attention sa on sa.openid = su.openid where 1=1
AND srs.id=#{registerId}
SELECT count(*) FROM sys_register_service WHERE sys_doctor_id=#{id} and date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate}

SELECT MIN(srs.DATE) AS availableDate ,DATE_FORMAT(srs.begin_time,'%H:%i') AS begin_time,sh.name,sh.position,srs.date,sdl.location, srs.location_id as location_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y:%c:%d'),DATE_FORMAT(MIN(srs.date),'%Y:%c:%d')) available_time, MIN(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(srs.date, ' ', srs.begin_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS latest_time,srs.service_type,sdl.shot_visit_time AS shot_time FROM sys_register_service srs INNER JOIN sys_hospital sh ON srs.sys_hospital_id = sh.id INNER JOIN sys_doctor_location sdl ON sdl.id=srs.location_id WHERE srs.sys_doctor_id= #{id} AND ( srs.date > CURDATE() OR (srs.date = CURDATE() and srs.begin_time >= CURTIME()) ) AND srs.status=0 GROUP BY srs.location_id,srs.sys_hospital_id ORDER BY latest_time ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM sys_register_service srs INNER JOIN scan_code_no_charge scnc ON scnc.sys_doctor_id = srs.sys_doctor_id WHERE scnc.marketer IN ( SELECT doctor_marketer FROM sys_attention sa WHERE openid = #{openid} AND DATE_ADD(update_time, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) > NOW()) and scnc.sys_doctor_id = (select sys_doctor_id from sys_register_service where id=#{register_service_id})

SELECT MIN(srs.DATE) AS availableDate ,DATE_FORMAT(srs.begin_time,'%H:%i') AS begin_time,sh.name,sh.position,srs.date,sdl.location, srs.location_id as location_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y:%c:%d'),DATE_FORMAT(MIN(srs.date),'%Y:%c:%d')) available_time, MIN(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(srs.date, ' ', srs.begin_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS latest_time,srs.service_type, sdl.shot_visit_time AS shot_time FROM sys_register_service srs INNER JOIN sys_hospital sh ON srs.sys_hospital_id = sh.id inner join sys_doctor_location sdl on sdl.id=srs.location_id WHERE STATUS=0 AND (DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(srs.DATE,'%Y:%c:%d'),DATE_FORMAT(srs.begin_time,' %k:%i:%s')),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s'))>NOW() AND srs.sys_doctor_id= #{doctorId} and srs.DATE=#{date} GROUP BY sdl.location,srs.sys_hospital_id ORDER BY latest_time ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(srs.begin_time,'%H:%i')begin_time, sh.`name` as hospitalName, sh.position as position, min(srs.date) as date, sdl.location as location, srs.location_id as location_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y:%c:%d'),DATE_FORMAT(min(srs.date),'%Y:%c:%d')) as available_time , min(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(srs.date, ' ', srs.begin_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) as latest_time, sh.id as sys_hospital_id FROM sys_register_service srs INNER JOIN sys_hospital sh ON srs.sys_hospital_id = sh.id INNER JOIN sys_doctor_location sdl ON sdl.id=srs.location_id WHERE STATUS=0 AND (DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(srs.DATE,'%Y:%c:%d'),DATE_FORMAT(srs.begin_time,' %k:%i:%s')),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s'))>NOW() AND srs.sys_doctor_id= #{doctorId} GROUP BY srs.location_id,srs.sys_hospital_id ORDER BY latest_time ASC

select DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE,'%Y:%c:%d'),DATE_FORMAT(end_time,' %k:%i:%s')),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as visitTime from sys_register_service srs left join patient_register_service prs on srs.id = prs.sys_register_service_id where prs.id=#{id}
select anp.* from sys_register_service srs, appointment_need_pay anp WHERE srs.sys_hospital_id = anp.sys_hospital_id and srs.id=#{register_service_id}

select count(prs.id) FROM patient_register_service prs, sys_register_service srs, sys_user su, sys_patient sp where sp.sys_user_id = su.id AND prs.sys_patient_id = sp.id AND su.openid = #{openid} AND prs.sys_register_service_id = srs.id AND srs.sys_doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND srs.sys_hospital_id in (select anp_1.sys_hospital_id sys_hospital_id from sys_register_service srs_1, appointment_need_pay anp_1 WHERE srs_1.sys_hospital_id = anp_1.sys_hospital_id and srs_1.id=#{register_service_id}) AND prs.status!='6'

select count(prs.id) FROM patient_register_service prs, sys_register_service srs, sys_user su, sys_patient sp where sp.sys_user_id = su.id AND prs.sys_patient_id = sp.id AND su.openid = #{openid} AND prs.sys_register_service_id = srs.id AND prs.status!='6'

select shs.hospital_type hospitalType from sys_register_service srs, sys_hospital_contact shc, sys_hospital shs WHERE shc.sys_hospital_id = shs.id AND srs.sys_hospital_id = shc.sys_hospital_id AND srs.id=#{register_service_id}
